files.patch:
@@ -701,1 +701,1 @@ - * [1] The full name of a property should be used when setting the property. + * [1] The full name of a property should be used to set the property. @@ -726,0 +726,4 @@ + *

Legacy Property Names

+ * JDK releases prior to JDK 17 support the use of URI style prefix for properties + * which will continue to be supported. The following table lists the legacy names + * for the properties. @@ -727,0 +731,64 @@ + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + *
Legacy Property Names
PropertyLegacy Property Name(s)

{@code elementAttributeLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/elementAttributeLimit}
{@code maxOccurLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/maxOccurLimit}
{@code totalEntitySizeLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/totalEntitySizeLimit}

{@code maxParameterEntitySizeLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/maxParameterEntitySizeLimit}
{@code entityReplacementLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/entityReplacementLimit}
{@code maxElementDepth}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/maxElementDepth}
{@code maxXMLNameLimit}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/maxXMLNameLimit}
{@code isStandalone}{@code http://www.oracle.com/xml/jaxp/properties/isStandalone}
